full_summary:
## Cancelled Tender Notice PW-22-01017790
### Publication Date
Published on: 20 December 2022
### Notice Type
Request for Information
### Invitation Status
Cancelled
### Categories
Construction Services, Commodities and Industries
### Regions of Opportunity
Canada, Europe, Mexico, and the United States
### Regions of Delivery
Alberta, Canada
### The Government of
Defence Construction Canada
#### Address
Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K3
#### Contact Person
Mark Smith, mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 613-859-0549

Dear Bidders,
Please note that this tender notice, PW-22-01017790, has been cancelled and will no longer proceed.

A complete list of GSN-codes: [5121A, 5122A, 5123B, 5124B, 5128B, 5129B, 5139A, 5139C, 5159B]

Some key procurement details:
* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services, Commodities and Industries
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**:  Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

Original GSN description: Construction of one and two dwelling buildings, construction of multi-dwelling buildings, construction of warehouses and industrial buildings, construction of commercial buildings, construction of health buildings, construction of other buildings, services of construction, not elsewhere specified, general heavy construction, and other special trade construction work.

Original UNSPSC codes fields were left blank and empty. Thus, that section has been omitted.

**Trade Agreement covers**: [Canada, European Union, United States, and Mexico]

**Regions of Delivery**: Alberta, Canada

**Regions of Opportunity**: [Canada, Europe, Mexico, and the United States]

The **Notice for Request of Information for PW-22-01017790** has been cancelled.

Note to Mark Smith (distributed contact): [Receipt sent to: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 613-859-0549]

Please observe that there was no contact fax field provided; the contact addresses of distribution by information collected for future use purposes; The full contact information includes postal code for obtaining the proper exact scenario numbers;
